title: I just realized twitch prime = amazon prime....
body:
welp, guess i'm not gettin it.

i don't particularly want to pay 10.99 a month for ad free twitch and a free sub a month... yeah i know amazon prime is this whole network of other stuff but I'll never use it....

like... i haven't bought anything from amazon in like.... 8 years.....

Is amazon prime worth?

also yes, slowpoke.jpg
